description: The story takes place in Okinawa, where Haruka forms a beach volleyball pair with Kanata. Kanata, who couldn't handle the pressure put on her by her short height, had given up on beach volleyball already, but is convinced by Haruka to step back on the sand once again and aim for the junior tournament.

tags.name: Volleyball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of volleyball.

name.native: ラスマス・フェイバー

node.description:
[Website](https://rasmusfaber.com/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/Rasmus_Faber) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rasmusfaber/)

Rasmus Faber is a music artist from Stockholm, Sweden. He is a pianist, DJ, remixer, composer, record producer, sound engineer and founder of the record label Farplane Records. He is mostly active in the electronic dance music genre, but also ventures into a wide variety of other musical styles. Rasmus performs solo as a DJ and pianist, and live with his band the RaFa Orchestra.
**Sugiyama Shinji (杉山晋史)** is a Japanese art designer and background artist.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [voice actor](https://anilist.co/staff/95255/)._
